did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Programs, broadsides, coupons, magazines, schedules, and other ephemera and written material pertaining to the 1994 Gay Games in New York City, especially the women's ice hockey and martial arts competitions.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: Gay Games 94 participant, member of the Washington DC Mighty Dykes ice hockey team, and martial arts participant.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Programs, broadsides, coupons, magazines, schedules, and other ephemera and written material pertaining to the 1994 Gay Games in New York City, especially the women's ice hockey and martial arts competitions.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Barbara Neal's Gay Games memorabilia, #7584. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.p:
